transliteration_en: Tab bat yadaa abee Lahabinw-wa tabb
transliteration_id: Tabbat yadā abī lahabiw wa tabb(a).
translation_en: May the hands of Abu Lahab be ruined, and ruined is he.
translation_id: Binasalah kedua tangan Abu Lahab dan benar-benar binasa dia.

arabic: مَآ اَغْنٰى عَنْهُ مَالُهٗ وَمَا كَسَبَۗ
transliteration_en: Maa aghna 'anhu maaluhu wa ma kasab
transliteration_id: Mā agnā ‘anhu māluhū wa mā kasab(a).
translation_en: His wealth will not avail him or that which he gained.
translation_id: Tidaklah berguna baginya hartanya dan apa yang dia usahakan.

transliteration_en: Sa yas laa naran zaata lahab
translation_en: He will [enter to] burn in a Fire of [blazing] flame
translation_id: Kelak dia akan memasuki api yang bergejolak (neraka),

translation_en: And his wife [as well] - the carrier of firewood.
translation_id: (begitu pula) istrinya, pembawa kayu bakar (penyebar fitnah).

translation_en: Around her neck is a rope of [twisted] fiber.
translation_id: Di lehernya ada tali dari sabut yang dipintal.
